answers.answer: Just keep an eye on your doctor will keep checking it every appt. Its not thst high yet just slightly. Maybe it won't get worse :-) worse case it gets worse and or you have preeclampsia and possibly get induced. But it will ok just watch for other signs of preeclampsia.
Ok. Thank you. You're post was very helpful. :)

question: Hey, I'm 31 weeks pregnant due December 1st and right when I hit 30 weeks my blood pressure started to rise. All the way up till now my blood pressure was fine. It was 119/76. But now it is 140/85. I'm worried.
title: high blood pressure and 31 weeks today.
